Package ch.zhaw.hhrt.moodlightreferenceapp

Android-App for remote control of a Moodlight over Bluetooth.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection
    Handles connection and data transfer with the Moodlight.
    MainActivity
    Command center of the app.
    RgbwFragment
    Red-Green-Blue+White view (fragment) of the app.
    ServiceFragment
    Service view (fragment) of the app.

Package ch.zhaw.hhrt.moodlightreferenceapp Description

Android-App for remote control of a Moodlight over Bluetooth.

This is the reference app for the Electro Technics Project ETP in the second year of the electronics engineering curriculum at the Zurich University of Applied Sciences.
The code is intended as a template or starting point for own implementations.

Version:
0.8 date 21.10.2016

Tips for code documentation:

Short description ends with ". x" where x stands for any uppercase letter or end of line.

Use <p> to start a new paragraph and
<br> to start a new line.
See in the source code of this file on how to include an image.
In other words: HTML tags can be used for formatting the documentation.

Author:
Hanspeter Hochreutener, hhrt@zhaw.ch
